triviaMaze.inputService

Class ConsoleInputService

  • java.lang.Object
    • triviaMaze.inputService.ConsoleInputService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cleanable, ITmInputService

    public class ConsoleInputService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITmInputService
    This class is an InputService which takes input from the console and passes it through as an event which is then fired and handled.
    Author:
    Jacob Erdman, Randy Heckard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsoleInputService()
      Creates a new ConsoleInputService in which input is read directly from console
      ConsoleInputService(java.io.File readFile)
      Creates a new ConsoleInputService in which input is read directly from a file

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsoleInputService

        public ConsoleInputService()
        Creates a new ConsoleInputService in which input is read directly from console

      • ConsoleInputService

        public ConsoleInputService(java.io.File readFile)
        Creates a new ConsoleInputService in which input is read directly from a file
        Parameters:
        readFile - The File object corresponding to the file with input instructions to be handled. Those instructions should be on separate lines

    • Method Detail

      • getInput

        public java.lang.String getInput()
        Description copied from interface: ITmInputService
        Gets input from the user playing the game
        Specified by:
        getInput in interface ITmInputService
        Returns:
        Returns a string representing the input the user gave. If the string is a single character long, it represents a key press, otherwise it represents a specific event.
